attributes.action: change the law so that any taxpayer funded organisation or institution, such as central government; local government; NHS hospitals; state run schools and prisons are made secular where absolutely no form of religious belief is acknowledged or allowed to be practised.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The state should NOT be involved in religion at all and certainly should not be using taxpayer pounds to support or allow it's practise in taxpayer funded organisations in any form.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
